text: Tot, kto idot pryamym putom Istiny Allakha, prinosit sebe pol'zu, a tot, kto ne idot pryamym putom, nakhoditsya v zabluzhdenii i nanosit vred samomu sebe. Dusha, nesushchaya noshu svoyego grekha, ne ponesot noshu grekha drugoy dushi. My ne nakazyvayem nikogo za grekhi, poka ne poshlom yemu svoyego poslannika, kotoryy ukazhet na pryamoy put' istiny, uderzhivayushchiy lyudey ot zabluzhdeniya
